nodes.text: Bespin Motors was a vehicle manufacturing company that produced the Storm IV Twin-Pod model of cloud car. The company was named for the gas giant Bespin where their vehicles were frequently used by the security forces of Cloud City. They also manufactured repulsor sleds used for the safe transport of carbon-frozen exotic gasses.

Bespin Motors was originally created by Bill Slavicsek and Curtis Smith for The Star Wars Sourcebook, a Star Wars Legends reference book released in 1987. The company was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
